from math import factorial as fact

def nCr(n,r):
    if r == 1:  return n
    r = min(r,n-r)
    if r == 0:  return 1
    num = den = 1
    for i in xrange(r):
        num *= n
        den *= r
        n -= 1
        r -= 1
    return num/den

for cases in xrange(int(raw_input())):
    l = list(map(int,raw_input().split()))
    k = int(raw_input())
    l.sort(reverse=True)
    d = {}
    used = {}
    for i in xrange(len(l)):
        if i < k:
            if l[i] not in used:   used[l[i]] = 0
            used[l[i]] += 1
        if l[i] not in d:  d[l[i]] = 0
        d[l[i]] += 1
    count = 1
    for i in used:
        count *= nCr(d[i],used[i])
    print count
